concept.title: IBM StoredIQ data server parameters
concept.shortdesc: Enable or disable ports or services on the IBM StoredIQ data server.

conbody.p:
To manage ports, you can use the /usr/local/storediq/bin/util/port_handler.pyc script with the appropriate parameter: python /usr/local/storediq/bin/util/port_handler.pyc -parameter
-s To list the current rules in iptables
-l To list the supported services
-d port_number|'port_range' To delete a port or a range of port numbers from iptables, for example: python /usr/local/storediq/bin/util/port_handler.pyc -d '21200:21299'
-e 'service_name' To enable a speci³c service, for example, to enable HTTPS services: python /usr/local/storediq/bin/util/port_handler.pyc -e 'PROD-https'
-d 'service_name' To disable a speci³c service, for example, to disable HTTPS services:python /usr/local/storediq/bin/util/port_handler.pyc -d 'PROD-https'
